channel.title: Cisco on Building Ideas
channel.description: Recent content in Cisco on Building Ideas

item.title: Cisco-R1# reload in/at A Life Saver !
item.description: We are well aware of how tricky can our life get when we are making some changes into our network device configuration and suddenly the ssh access gets disconnected , which can be more interesting if the device is in the Data Centre . We will either need to reboot the device physically going to the location to gain our old configuration or be very precise by using this life saver command in Cisco devices which I will be discussing about.

item.title: OSPF Adjacency State
item.description: OSPF has always been one of the most difficult dynamic routing protocols personally for me to understand if we try to deep dive into the protocol itself. In this blog let me briefly explain the different adjacency state that 2 routers go through before they exchange the route. Down No hello has been received from the neighbors. Attempt Unicast hello has been sent to the neighbor router but no hello has been received back yet Init
